1.0.6.en: Added support for ELKO Smart Wirless Switch

1.0.7.en: Added error handling to prevent some device to get unavailable.

1.0.8.en: Added error handling to prevent some devices to get unavailable

1.0.9.en: Added error handling to prevent some devices to get unavailable

1.0.10.en: Redesigned Power meter and metering. It now uses the defined thermostat load in settings to calculate the metering based on relay. Power meter uses defined load to give a more preciese value in Energy tab. Fixed a error with regulator mode and flow. Fixed a error not able to set Power status on unit in flows

1.1.0.en: Fixed kWh bug, returned to old logic. Added SmartStikkDobbel & SmartStikkEnkel. Added Multiwire dimmer id's to code. Made preperations for PIR devices.
